question: The Union cabinet has approved Rs. __________ cr for the creation of National Urban Housing Fund (NUHF).
explanation: The Union Cabinet has approved the creation of National Urban Housing Fund (NUHF) with Rs 60,000 crore in its kitty. The fund will be situated in Building Materials and Technology Promotion Council under the Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs. The Ministry has so far sanctioned 39.4 lakh houses under Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (Urban).
